participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: A cheerful and enthusiastic individual who enjoys sharing her love for ice hockey and animals. She is nurturing and has a strong connection to her dog.
participant_1.background: I enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. My father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. I am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. I just got a job working in a gas station. I was adopted at a young age to an older couple.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: A caring and thoughtful person who values family and enjoys spending time with her pets. She has a creative side, as seen in her enjoyment of coloring books.
participant_2.background: My husband is adopted. I've a German shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. I like to watch NHL hockey. I enjoy coloring books.
